content: In England we are about to kick off a FHIR based project looking at PHR systems. Is anyone else working on FHIR based PHR systems?
lots but I'll let them self-identify. Are you aware of the Lithuanian project?
@Grahame Grieve - I'm aware there is a Lithuanian project but bot the details
@Richard Kavanagh In Finland there's active work on a national PHR based on FHIR, see http://www.kanta.fi/web/ammattilaisille/omakannan-omatietovarannon-maarittelyt
Also stream Finnish PHR here in Zulip
